jobTitle.title: Life Choices graduate skilled in Full Stack Web Development.

about: As a recent graduate from Life Choices Academy, I've developed a strong foundation in full stack web development. Throughout my time at the academy, I honed my skills in various technologies, enabling me to tackle diverse and complex challenges using code. One aspect I particularly enjoyed was assisting my peers on the bugs/issues their had on their Vue.js/Node.js/MySQL queries, Additionally, I discovered a passion for design while using Figma. Not only did these experiences benefit my peers, but it also provided me with numerous ways of solving problems.

Now, I'm eager to apply both my theoretical knowledge and hands-on experience to launch my professional coding career. Initially, I aim to specialize as a front-end developer for the first two years, leveraging my skills to create engaging and user-friendly interfaces. Beyond that, I have a keen interest in transitioning into QA Testing, where I can continue to refine my problem-solving abilities and ensure the quality of software products for the long term.

Outside of coding, I'm deeply passionate about financial markets and trading. You'll often find me absorbed in charts, analyzing strategies, and backtesting market movements. I enjoy using institutional methods to anticipate future market movements and identify potential targets. Additionally, I stay updated on financial news and upcoming events through platforms like CNBC and investing.com.

education.description: I recently graduated as full stack web developer
I graduated as a software developer
I graduated and obtained my certificates in full stack web development.

education.subjects: Mathematics, Life Science, Physics, English, IsiXhosa, Geography, L.O

testimonials.name: Simamkele
testimonials.quotes: Mzwamandoda Louw is a highly dedicated and inquisitive individual with an unwavering focus on achieving project goals. During some collaborative work in life choice academy, he consistently exhibited a strong commitment to learning and problem-solving. Even when we encountered challenges that seemed insurmountable, he demonstrated a remarkable willingness to go the extra mile and thoroughly investigate areas that required further understanding until he successfully grasped the concepts.

testimonials.name: Damon
testimonials.quotes: Mzwamadoda is a hard-working, driven individual who dedicates himself to tasks wholly. He is a well-mannered, honest man with a big heart, strong determination to better himself and is an absolute joy to work with.

testimonials.name: Taryn-lee
testimonials.quotes: Mzwamadoda is truly an amazing person who is always willing to help those around him ,he is both compassionate and kind .Mzwamadoda's work ethic and professionalism are impeccable and admirable.he is truly an inspiration to other around him..

testimonials.name: Anathi
testimonials.quotes: Mzwamadoda Shawn Louw is a happy and thriving classmates who loves studying.He is a well-rounded classmate who is doing well in all areas. He is very responsible,passionate,dedicated and enthusiastic in his school work. He knows how to communicate with his peers, kind, humble and he is always willing to assist his classmates when they ask for help..

testimonials.name: Ghamzah
testimonials.quotes: Throughout his internship, Mzwamadoda consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and a thirst for learning. He actively sought feedback, eagerly embraced new technologies, and took initiatives to enhance his skill set. His commitment to self-improvement will undoubtedly make him a valuable asset to any software development team.I highly recommend Mzwamadoda to any organization seeking a talented and dedicated individual to join their team.

projects.name: Book Library
projects.description: This is my first project built using Angular JS(18). The website allows users to browse and manage books with key features like authentication, a cart system, the ability to view a single book, remove books from the cart, and checkout. Hosted on Firebase, it provides a smooth and responsive experience.

projects.name: Nature Nibbles(WooCommerce)
projects.description: Collaborated on a team project using WordPress (Pantheon) to create a WooCommerce site. I was responsible for developing the Home and Products pages, ensuring they were functional and visually appealing.

projects.name: Capstone Project(One Stop DotConnect)
projects.description: This project allows users to request services with service providers. I focused on both front-end and the backend using (Vue.js for the front-end, and Node.js with Express.js for the backend and MYSQL for database).

projects.name: Haa-zwaa Coffee Shop
projects.description: This project was a collaborative effort between myself and Haanim. While I focused on the front-end development, my colleague handled the backend. We utilized Figma for design, Vue.js for the front-end, and Node.js with Express.js for the backend. Our database was managed using MySQL.

projects.name: Roster Management System
projects.description: This Angular web app displays a daily team roster using Google Charts to visualize task distribution among developers. It uses a JSON-based data structure, loads dynamically, and presents key management insights. Login Details: David Bishops(Team Leader) password:1234
